translations: vt.按份额发放（dole 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Taking a step that many professors may view as a bit counterproductive, some colleges and universities are doling out Apple iPhones and Internet-capable iPods to their students.
sentences.translation: 一些高校正在向学生发放苹果的 iPhone 和可上网的 iPod，这一举措可能会让很多教授觉得有点适得其反。

sentences.sentence: Managing a team means more than just doling out work.
sentences.translation: 一支团队的管理不仅仅意味着分配工作。

sentences.sentence: Adjusting fiscal policy does not mean simply doling out more stimulus.
sentences.translation: 调整财政政策并不指简单的实施更多的激励措施。
